page.title: 05Father's Workday
page.content: My father gets up at a quarter to seven in the morning.He washes and shaves before eating his breakfast. At 8 o'clock he goes to work at Ffynon Dduon Farm in Pentwyn.First he lets the dog out for a run and takes the horses out into the field.He cleans the stable and puts down fresh sawdust for bedding.He warms some milk and puts it in the baby's bottle to feed the orphan lamb.After feeding the lamb he goes to Pant to tend to the calves. After dinner he does more jobs on the farm.Before coming home he puts the horses in the stable and feeds them. When he arrives home he cooks the dinner and we eat when my mother comes home from work.He watches television with my mother and goes to bed at 10.30 p.m.
